results.content: It is a good course. I learned a lot from it, but one disappointing thing is that the Audio is very low, and he must do something about that.

response.content:
Dear Albert Morvey, 
Thank you for your good feedback and I feel sorry about the issue of low audio. That is a strange thing because Udemy does not allow any course to be published if it does not have adequate audio. Moreover, I have not received such complain from any other student.  I will suggest you to try the videos using a headphone or some other machine.
response.content_html:
Dear Albert Morvey,
Thank you for your good feedback and I feel sorry about the issue of low audio. That is a strange thing because Udemy does not allow any course to be published if it does not have adequate audio. Moreover, I have not received such complain from any other student. I will suggest you to try the videos using a headphone or some other machine.
